EngX influences and enriches engineering culture and product development mindset. EngX strives for excellence and for making EPAM a better place for the Engineering Talent.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One of the products of the Center is \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/ENGX/EngX+Certification\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EngX Certification\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – process developed to define the current level of the project, find weak areas of the engineering processes, and determine optimal ways for improvement. Certification helps understand what’s wrong with delivery processes, how to improve quality, and how to accelerate project delivery.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://kb.epam.com/download/attachments/312417371/PM2.png?version=1&modificationDate=1622190766307&api=v2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":158.25759493670887}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Engineering Excellence also offers a variety of trainings and tools aimed to improve the engineering culture at EPAM and to bring out the best of every engineer.
